metadata.title: CVE-2021-20233 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in grub2 in versions prior to 2.06. Setparam_prefix() inthe menu rendering code performs a length calculation on the assumptionthat expressing a quoted single quote will require 3 characters, while itactually requires 4 characters which allows an attacker to corrupt memoryby one byte for each quote in the input. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as systemavailability.

criterions.comment: grub2-signed package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
grub2 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
